verses.roman:
ei mata vyañjanera śāka, mūla, phala
ei mata ciḍā, huḍuma, sandeśa sakala

synonyms: ei mata—in this way; vyañjanera—of vegetables; śāka—spinach; mūla—radishes; phala—fruits; ei mata—in this way; ciḍā—chipped rice; huḍuma—powdered rice; sandeśa—sweetmeats; sakala—all.
translation: "Thus with great care and attention Rāghava Paṇḍita would prepare spinach, other vegetables, radishes, fruits, chipped rice, powdered rice and sweetmeats.
